cost_3.name: Savage Stirring
cost_3.effect: Keep until your next turn. At the beginning of combat on each player's turn, that player may choose a creature. Until end of turn, that creature gets +3/+3, gains trample, and can't attack you.

cost_3.name: Turn Tail
cost_3.effect: Return up to two target creatures controlled by different players to their owners' hands.
